newsitem.title: FINLAND: KEMIRA UNIT TO INVEST FIM 50 MLN IN BRAZIL.
newsitem.headline: KEMIRA UNIT TO INVEST FIM 50 MLN IN BRAZIL.

text.p: Finnish chemicals group Kemira Oy said in a statement on Tuesday it would acquire a majority of its Brazilian based affiliate company Kemwater Brasil S.A. and start investment totalling about 50 million markka.
It said it would invest to strenghten the group's position in the Brazilian water treatment chemical market.
"By implementing this plan, the total investments being in the frame of 50 millon markka, Kemira will become the market leader in this area ( southern Brazil)," it said.
Co-owners in Kemwater are Brazilian Tibras S.A., Andrade Gutierrez S.A. and Sweden-based Kemira Kemi Ab, it said.
